favourite.article: May the words of this song speak to your heart. God loves you very much. Be truely happy with God.
Lord, how lovely and sweet to be in Your presence!
This is my true favorite song through which I met God twenty-two years ago.

Lord Jesus, I and my family adore only You. Only You can manipulate our lives. For You are the living God. You work in a sevenfold intensified way. You came and died to bear our sins. Now, we are one with You. Sorry for the times we are doubtful. Sorry for the times we have a weak faith. Sorry for the times we hurt You. Cause us to be faithful and not live apart from You. Glory to You!
